content.title: Google Meet Video Conference
content.visibleText: Michael Madume (Presenting) - This chat was created on 05/06/2024, 08:13. - Lifecycle on Chat Analysis. - Creating AI Author using chat responses, summarizing and analyzing 30-day results, and monitoring user interaction designs. - Slack Communication. - Discussing finalizing features for the next release. - Reviewing test results and providing updates on data points added to the project dashboard. - Preparing for upcoming meetings and ensuring alignment on project progress. - TeachApp Website Design. - Addressing update from the previous week. - Implementing new task types, improving user flows, and fixing code errors. - Creating AI-based lessons and using AI-powered tools to build lessons. - TeachApp KPIs and Priorities. - Reviewing and updating the TeachApp KPIs and roadmap priorities. - Tracking cumulative downloads, subscription rates, user engagement metrics, and revenue growth. - Focusing on user, user engagement, and monetization strategies. - Zoom Meetings. - Participating in multiple Zoom meetings, including team syncs and product reviews. - Discussing product delivery, user insights, and feedback from data and feedback forms. - TeachApp Marketing and Marketing Strategies. - Reviewing prototypes customer satisfaction surveys targeting AI teachers. - Monitoring the use of Google Forms responses. - Watching user navigation timelines and beta performance for various campaigns. - TeachApp SAT User Testing. - Managing user testing interview sign-ups for the TeachApp SAT course. - Coordinating with users, collecting feedback, and ensuring the smooth execution of user testing sessions. - Overall, the team has focused on product development, marketing, user testing, and project management to enhance the TeachApp platform and improve user experience. - Let me know if you need more details on any specific task! - B. Assist
